name: Run Santa Run
description:
Run Santa Run!

A Christmas special game.

This Christmas Run as much as far you  can,Collect Gifts,Avoid Obstacles  and score as much as you can.A exciting and addictive game for android.

Instructions :  1)Tap to jump

                                2)Collect gifts

                                3)Avoid Obstacles

Developed by AB Games (Abhishek Bhosale).
